ing: 2 small peaches, halved, pitted, and cut into 1/2-inch dice
1 cup chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste
2 tablespoons white sugar, or to taste
des: "This fruity and spicy salsa is yummy on just about everything from chips to barbequed chicken, tacos, and even tofu! By the way, pineapple mojitos are a great accompaniment!"
ins: Place the mango, peach, pineapple, tomato, onion, red pepper, yellow pepper, and cilantro in a mixing bowl. Stir in the garlic, jalapeno, lime juice, salt, sugar, and water. Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving.
